meanings.definition: Not mixed or blended with anything else.
meanings.sent1: The unmingled colors of the rainbow shone brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The artist used unmingled paint to create a vibrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The unmingled flavors of the ice cream made it a delightful treat.
meanings.sent4: Her unmingled joy was evident in her contagious laughter.
meanings.sent5: The unmingled beauty of the untouched forest took my breath away.

meanings.sent1: The unmingled gold sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She had unmingled admiration for his talent.
meanings.sent3: The unmingled joy on his face was priceless.
meanings.sent4: Her unmingled kindness touched everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The unmingled truth finally came to light.
